title: Currency Schema
description: JSON Schema for data received a currencyoverview response

lines.description: An array of currency data objects

pay.description: Details of the value of pay_currency_id in terms of get_currency_id

league_id.description: Identification number of the league from which this data was obtained

pay_currency_id.description: Identification number of the currency to be given i.e. the paying currency

get_currency_id.description: Identification number of the currency to be received i.e. the gotten currency

sample_time_utc.description: ISO 8601 date and time format at UTC+00:00

value.description: The number of the 'pay' currency needed to buy ONE of the 'get' currency

listing_count.description: Number of listings of this transaction on the trade site

receive.description: Details of the value of pay_currency_id in terms of get_currency_id. The ids are flipped compared to in 'pay'

league_id.description: Identification number of the league from which this data was obtained

pay_currency_id.description: Identification number of the currency to be given i.e. the paying currency

get_currency_id.description: Identification number of the currency to be received i.e. the gotten currency

sample_time_utc.description: ISO 8601 date and time format at UTC+00:00

value.description: The number of the 'pay' currency needed to buy ONE of the 'get' currency

listing_count.description: Number of listings of this transaction on the trade site

paySparkLine.description: Details regarding the change in value of pay_currency_id

data.description: 7-number array representing the change in the amount of pay_currency_id needed to buy get_currency_id

items.description: A data point representing the relative value of pay_currency_id

totalChange.description: Net change in the relative value of pay_currency_id. Always the last number in @data

receiveSparkLine.description: Details regarding the change in value of pay_currency_id. The ids are flipped compared to in 'paySparkLine'

data.description: 7-number array representing the change in the amount of pay_currency_id needed to buy get_currency_id

items.description: A data point representing the relative value of pay_currency_id

totalChange.description: Net change in the relative value of pay_currency_id. Always the last number in @data

chaosEquivalent.description: Number of Chaos Orbs 1 currencyTypeName is worth

lowConfidencePaySparkLine.description: Low confidence details regarding the change in value of pay_currency_id

data.description: 7-number array representing the change in the amount of pay_currency_id needed to buy get_currency_id

items.description: A data point representing the relative value of pay_currency_id

totalChange.description: Net change in the relative value of pay_currency_id. Always the last number in @data

lowConfidenceReceiveSparkLine.description: Low confidence details regarding the change in value of pay_currency_id. The ids are flipped compared to in 'lowConfidencePaySparkLine'

data.description: 7-number array representing the change in the amount of pay_currency_id needed to buy get_currency_id

items.description: A data point representing the relative value of pay_currency_id

totalChange.description: Net change in the relative value of pay_currency_id. Always the last number in @data

detailsId.description: Identification string of the currency specified by currencyTypeName
